measures.name: Number of Sign-ups running total in Date
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
	[Number of Sign-ups],
	FILTER(
		ALLSELECTED('Dates'[Date]),
		ISONORAFTER('Dates'[Date], MAX('Dates'[Date]), DESC)
	)
)

measures.name: Number of Sign-ups (PY) running total in Date
measures.expression:
CALCULATE(
	[Number of Sign-ups (PY)],
	FILTER(
		ALLSELECTED('Dates'[Date]),
		ISONORAFTER('Dates'[Date], MAX('Dates'[Date]), DESC)
	)
)
